description:
It has been more than a year since version 1.0 of a container orchestration engine called Kubernetes was released.

What happened during this time? What are our experiences with writing such a huge system in Go? What are the future plans? Should you start using it? Is it production ready? And, for those who have never heard about it, what is it all about? During this session Marcin will try to answer all of that.
title: Kubernetes: now and beyond! Marcin Wielgus at DevconTLV X
